file_content.text: I've been expecting you. The fool who defied the Emperor's glorious will.
Do you even understand what you threw away when you turned against him? Do you realize what others would give to serve his bidding?
I never thought to ask if the pure-blood Sith leading the assault team was male.
Who are you? Where's Krannus?
Colonel Hareth. Krannus's lover. If she's here, he can't be far.
Silence, traitor! My words are not meant for you!
You were expecting Krannus? He has business elsewhere.
I'll never serve the dark side.
The Emperor is evil.
Typical Jedi ignorance.
Nobody controls me--not even the Emperor. My mind is my own.
I'm no puppet.
We all have masters, Jedi. You simply chose the Council over the Emperor. You'll regret that.
I suppose I should thank you. You might have become the Emperor's right hand. Usurped my lover's rightful place.
Colonel Hareth? Status report.
The reactor is offline and this area is sealed, Executor. The Jedi is here. Our distraction worked perfectly.
We both know how this is going to end. Surrender now and you'll be treated fairly.
You can't win.
The strong do not fear death. We embrace it.
You did all this just to trap me?
Distraction?
The chaos Colonel Hareth unleashed purchased the time I required to complete my mission.
As soon as I'm done killing Colonel Hareth, you're next.
You're dead, Krannus.
You don't understand. We do not fear death. We embrace it.
Soon, all life on this world will be destroyed: you, me, Krannus--all of us sacrificed for the Emperor's glory.
He will become immortal. All powerful. He will raise up all those who served with true devotion. And together we will rule the galaxy!
The Emperor can't bring you back to life. The dark side only brings destruction.
You're insane.
You're truly willing to die for the Emperor?
This is a suicide mission?
One nice thing about dealing with crazy cultists: no prisoners.
Good. No surrender, then.
You refuse to see the truth. I don't have to defeat you--just slow you down. You've lost.
We will meet again at the Emperor's side, my love.
Let death take us all!
